005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
010
011import java.util.stream.Stream;
012
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
014
015public interface ICollectionValue {
016  /**
017   * Get the collection value as a sequence.
018   * <p>
019   * If the collection value is a sequence, then the sequence is returned.
020   *
021   * @return the resulting sequence
022   */
023  // TODO: rename to toSequence and resolve conflicting methods?
024  @NonNull
025  ISequence<?> asSequence();
026
027  /**
028   * Get the stream of items for the collection value.
029   * <p>
030   * If the collection value is a sequence, then the items in the collection are
031   * returned.
032   *
033   * @param value
034   *          the collection value
035   * @return the sequence of related items
036   */
037  @NonNull
038  static Stream<? extends IItem> normalizeAsItems(@NonNull ICollectionValue value) {
039    return value instanceof IItem
040        ? ObjectUtils.notNull(Stream.of((IItem) value))
041        : value.asSequence().stream();
042  }
043
044  /**
045   * Get the stream of items for the collection value.
046   * <p>
047   * If the collection value contains items, then these items are returned.
048   *
049   * @return a stream of related items
050   */
051  @NonNull
052  Stream<? extends IItem> flatten();
053}
